TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService
Public MustInherit Class WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService Inherits WorkflowRuntimeService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 允許認可工作批次的自訂邏輯。

span.span: Allows custom logic for the commitment of work batches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 認可工作批次時，執行階段會呼叫 ，並提供它委派以呼叫執行實際的工作批次認可動作。When a work batch is committed the runtime calls into the and gives it a delegate to call to do the actual committing of the work batch. 執行階段仍要負擔認可工作批次的主要責任，但允許 將本身插入自訂認可處理序的處理序中。The runtime still has the primary responsibility of committing the work batch but allows the to insert itself in the process for customization around the commit process. 此處理序允許自訂錯誤處理邏輯。This process allows custom error handling logic. 如果 擁有交易，也就是 屬性傳回 `null` 的情況，將因此需要建立新的存在交易，允許呼叫委派超過一次，為每次呼叫建立新的交易。If the owns the transaction, which is the case when the property returns `null` therefore necessitating the need to create a new ambient transaction, it is allowed to call the delegate more than once, creating a new transaction for each call. 這類情況最常見的例子有處理間歇性網路問題，或 SQL 叢集容錯移轉。The most common case for this for example is to handle intermittent network problems or SQL cluster failovers. 如果呼叫 會擲回例外狀況，則 可攔截此例外狀況、開始新交易和再次呼叫委派。If the call to the throws an exception can catch this exception, start a new transaction and call the delegate again. 如此可為工作流程執行個體的執行提供某種程度的恢復，否則可能導致工作流程終止。This gives a level of resilience to workflow instance execution that otherwise would cause workflows to terminate. ## Examples 下列範例示範繼承自 的類別。The following example demonstrates a class that inherits from . [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void CommitWorkBatch (System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService.CommitWorkBatchCallback commitWorkBatchCallback);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CommitWorkBatch(class System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService/CommitWorkBatchCallback commitWorkBatchCallback) cil managed

param.name: commitWorkBatchCallback
param.span: 會委派給呼叫以認可工作批次。

span.span: The delegate to call to commit the work batch.
Called to commit the work batch.
